author: adityapatwardhan
body:

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It seems new tests not needed - why validate an entity what is absent? Or alternatively we would check a exact format of the copyright string.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
I agree with @iSazonov - we don't really need a test for this.

If the code were to change, maintainers will want to understand the reasoning behind the change before merging - regardless of the existence of a test.

And you also added a file in your last commit that shouldn't be there.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body:
@iSazonov  @lzybkr Removed tests and files added inadvertently. 
We were recommended by CELA (legal) to remove year from copyright strings.

title: Removed automatically adding year to copyright message
